001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Objects;
007import java.util.ServiceLoader;
008
009import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
010import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
011
012/**
013 * Creates JStachios mainly with the {@link ServiceLoader} or a {@link Builder}.
014 *
015 * @author agentgt
016 *
017 */
018public final class JStachioFactory {
019
020        /**
021         * @hidden
022         */
023        private JStachioFactory() {
024
025        }
026
027        /**
028         * Provides a singleton JStachio resolved by the {@link ServiceLoader}
029         * @return service loader based jstachio.
030         */
031        public static JStachio defaultJStachio() {
032                return Holder.INSTANCE;
033        }
034
035        /**
036         * A <em>mutable</em> builder to create {@link JStachio} from
037         * {@link JStachioExtension}s.
038         * @return empty builder
039         */
040        public static Builder builder() {
041                return new Builder();
042        }
043
044        private static class Holder extends AbstractJStachio {
045
046                private static Holder INSTANCE = Holder.of();
047
048                private final JStachioExtensions extensions;
049
050                public Holder(JStachioExtensions extensions) {
051                        this.extensions = extensions;
052                }
053
054                private static Holder of() {
055                        Iterable<JStachioExtension> it = ServiceLoader.load(JStachioExtension.class);
056                        return new Holder(JStachioExtensions.of(it));
057                }
058
059                @Override
060                public JStachioExtensions extensions() {
061                        return this.extensions;
062                }
063
064        }
065
066        /**
067         * Builder for creating jstachios.
068         *
069         * @author agent
070         *
071         */
072        public static class Builder {
073
074                private List<JStachioExtension> extensions = new ArrayList<>();
075
076                private List<TemplateInfo> templates = new ArrayList<>();
077
078                /**
079                 * Constructor is hidden for now.
080                 */
081                private Builder() {
082                }
083
084                /**
085                 * Adds an extension
086                 * @param extension not null
087                 * @return this
088                 */
089                public Builder add(JStachioExtension extension) {
090                        extensions.add(extension);
091                        return this;
092                }
093
094                /**
095                 * Add extensions.
096                 *
097                 * Useful for adding ServiceLoader results: <pre>
098                 * <code class="language-java">
099                 * builder.add(ServiceLoader.load(JStachioExtension.class));
100                 * </code> </pre>
101                 * @param extensions not null
102                 * @return this
103                 */
104                public Builder add(Iterable<JStachioExtension> extensions) {
105                        extensions.forEach(this.extensions::add);
106                        return this;
107                }
108
109                /**
110                 * Registers an instantiated template. The templates will be added to
111                 * {@link JStachioTemplateFinder} with order <code>-1</code> when {@link #build()}
112                 * is called.
113                 * @param template usually a generated renderer.
114                 * @return this
115                 */
116                public Builder add(TemplateInfo template) {
117                        Objects.requireNonNull(template, "template");
118                        templates.add(template);
119                        return this;
120                }
121
122                /**
123                 * Registers instantiated templates. The templates will be added
124                 * {@link JStachioTemplateFinder} with order <code>-1</code> when {@link #build()}
125                 * is called.
126                 * @param templates usually a generated renderer.
127                 * @return this
128                 */
129                public Builder add(Collection<? extends TemplateInfo> templates) {
130                        this.templates.addAll(templates);
131                        return this;
132                }
133
134                /**
135                 * Builds a JStachio by coalescing the extensions and registered templates.
136                 *
137                 * @apiNote See {@link JStachioExtensions} for logic on how the extensions are
138                 * consolidated.
139                 * @return resolved JStachio
140                 */
141                public JStachio build() {
142                        List<JStachioExtension> resolved = new ArrayList<>();
143                        if (!templates.isEmpty()) {
144                                var templatesCopy = List.copyOf(templates);
145                                JStachioTemplateFinder f = JStachioTemplateFinder.of(templatesCopy, -1);
146                                f = JStachioTemplateFinder.cachedTemplateFinder(f);
147                                resolved.add(f);
148                        }
149                        resolved.addAll(extensions);
150                        return new DefaultJStachio(JStachioExtensions.of(resolved));
151                }
152
153        }
154
155}
